Tooltip: This activity gets all buckets from the specified folder. If no folder is provided, then it returns all buckets for the folder the current process is running in.

Arguments.Name: Folder
Arguments.Tooltip: Folder to search for buckets. If not specified, uses the current folder that the process is running within.

Arguments.Name: Filter
Arguments.Tooltip: OData filter string used as a query parameter. See RPA-446/OData 4 APIs for reference on how to build a filter.
